title: Ekkos passive with ninja tabi
body: Does "Ninja Tabi" blocks Ekkos passive damage as its an auto attack?

replies.body: i doubt it would lower the passives damage, i feel it would just lower ekkos auto attack PHYSICAL damage by 10%. I could be wrong but i never thought ninja tabi blocked magic on hit damage.

You are right. It shouldn't.
As another example, Diana's passive doesn't reduce because of NInja Tabi. 
It's a little difficult to explain the difference.

It's only  spells that modify your basic attack or spells that are considered basic attacks, not spells that add on top of your basic attacks.
Examples of the former.
Wukong Q.
Yasuo Q.
Nasus Q.
Ezreal Q.
Volibear Q. 
Etc.

Correct me if I'm wrong, but I am 99% sure of it.

According to the wiki, that's spot on (not sure about some of the examples you used though). Ninja Tabi will reduce damage of auto attacks and aa modifiers, for example Volibear's **Thunder Claws**, but not damage of on-hit effects, for example Ekko's **Z-Drive Resonance**.

Because Ekko's passive is an actual ability (like q,w,e ect) it certainly can't be blocked with ninja tabi (like teemo's e on hit damage isn't).
